entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Sydney location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-08-24 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-08-24 20:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Sydney instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-08-17 05:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-08-17 09:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to New Jersey instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Singapore location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-08-15 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-08-15 20:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Singapore instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage affecting Vultr Load Balancers (VLB) in all locations.  The deployment of new Vultr Load Balancers has been temporarily disabled.  Existing load balancers are currently locked.  Certain actions, including the modification of VLB configurations, are unavailable at this time.  Our engineers are actively working to restore service as quickly as possible.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage affecting Vultr Kubernetes Engine (VKE) in all locations.  The creation of new VKE clusters has been temporarily disabled.  Existing clusters have been temporarily locked.  Certain actions, including scaling existing clusters and retrieving kubectl configuration files are currently disabled.  Our engineers are actively working to restore service as quickly as possible.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Johannesburg location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Amsterdam and Silicon Valley locations. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Amsterdam and Silicon Valley locations. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

[ New Jersey Object Storage Update ]

Affected Product : New Jersey Object Storage

There are an increased number of reports regarding performance and timeouts. These issues are currently being addressed to bring object storage to a more optimal state.

[ New Jersey Object Storage Maintenance Update ]

Affected Product : New Jersey Object Storage 
Maintenance Date : Monday, July 24

Further maintenance and upgrades will be conducted for the New Jersey Object Storage product starting on Monday, July 24.  Customers may observe some performance disruption and client access timeouts for New Jersey object storage subscriptions during this work.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.
